name: 切尔西·里维拉
name_full: 切尔西·里维拉 Chelsea Rivera

last_movies.title: 末日巡逻队 第一季

introduction: Chelsea Rivera is an award-winning actor, writer, and producer born in New York City. She is best known for her roles in "Doom Patrol" and "Female Friendly".Chelsea co-created the comedic series, Female Friendly, which has screened at multiple festivals, including HollyShorts, Austin Web Fest, and iO's LA Scripted Comedy Festival. In January of 2021, Chelsea's comedic pilot, All Mixed Up, won Best Short Episodic in the Screencraft TV Pilot Script Competition.
